summary: A set of updated meshes for DenenC's Leather Sandals mod, that fixes some of the most noticeable clipping issues. UNP version ONLY.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]Description:

[/b][/size][/color][size=3]A set of updated [color=#fff2cc]UNP[/color] meshes for [/size][size=3]DenenC[/size][size=3]'s [/size][size=3]Leather Sandals[/size][size=3] mod, that fixes some of the most noticeable clipping issues:[/size]

[size=3]-Feet soles clipping through the sandals soles while sprinting[/size]
[size=3]-Feet clipping through the sandals straps while crouching[/size]

[b][color=#a4c2f4][size=4]Installation:

[/size][/color][/b][size=3]Simply copy the contents of the Data folder from the archive to your Skyrim Data folder. Override when prompted.[/size]

[color=#a4c2f4][size=4][b]Credits:

[/b][/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3053696][size=3]DenenC[/size][/url] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75905?tab=description][size=3]Leather Sandals[/size][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3347902][size=3]tiwa44[/size][/url] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376][size=3]UNP Minidresses Collection[/size][/url]
author: ThatMrSmile
